LA RUSICA is a Neapolitan pizzeria serving very authentic italian pizza backed in wood oven. The oven was built and customised in Napoli. We use daily fresh hand made dough made by Saudi hands whom are trained with certified professional pizzaiolo (Pizza Maker) in Napoli.
Our pizza cheese is a DOP Buffalo Mozzarella which imported in weekly basis from Italy.

Sunday – 5:00pm – 11:30pm
Monday - 5:00pm – 11:30pm
Tuesday – 5:00pm – 11:30pm
Wednesday – 5:00pm – 11:30pm
Thursday – 5:00pm – 11:30pm
Friday – 1:30pm – 11:30pm
Saturday – 1:30pm – 11:30pm
